dcterms:creator: M. Marcus
B. Santorini
M. A. Marcinkiewicz
dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank is a large annotated corpus of English that includes documents from various sources such as radio transcripts, governmental documents, and financial news reports. It is annotated with linguistic information like syntactic tree structures and part-of-speech tags, although these annotations are discarded for the purpose of this work.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank (PTB)
